Title: Establishes a right of action for the deprivation of constitutional rights
Summary: Establishes a right of action for the deprivation of constitutional rights; provides for compensatory damages, punitive damages, injunctive and declaratory relief, and reasonable attorney's fees.
LawCode: Add Art 8-A ยง85, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to establishing a right of action for the deprivation of constitutional rights
